archimate:Requirement.name: IR.1.2.3b: b) determine the potential business impact should the confidentiality, integrity or availability of information be compromised (e.g. by performing a business impact assessment)
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
